Consistent with the other attacks, at night within the same wide range as the others.

I heard they were building up around it,.msgid: I heard they were building up around it, yes.  Suppose it's necessary to ensure their survival.  You could try talking to some of the staff here, some of the regular visitors, or the refugees in the back.

Would any of the staff be able to help?.msgid: Would any of the staff be able to help?

Think any of the visitors would be inter.msgid: Think any of the visitors would be interested?

I'll see what I can do..msgid: I'll see what I can do.

The local merchant already has some sort.msgid: The local merchant already has some sort of deal going on with Ms. McKinnon, so I doubt that will work.  Not many travelers stop by the doctor, but worth asking.  That just leaves the broker in the back room.  Might be worth a shot, but any trade deal would be risky without ensuring we already have a stable food supply.

Thanks, I'll see what I can do..msgid: Thanks, I'll see what I can do.

There's a government official of some so.msgid: There's a government official of some sort who seems to have been assigned here by somebody, I'm guessing whoever's actually in charge might know something.  Other than that there's just a local scavenger or two, possibly worth inquiring with them anyway.

I doubt any of them would be willing to.msgid: I doubt any of them would be willing to venture out there to find work, even if Sofia might be more welcoming than the staff here.  But if you ask the right questions, someone surely has to know someone else, or might be willing to keep an eye out and assist with winning local traders and scavengers over.  I could help do the same if you would like.

I'll figure something out. Thanks, thou.msgid: I'll figure something out.  Thanks, though.

I'll do what I can to speak with other s.msgid: I'll do what I can to speak with other scavengers that stop by.  I would suggest continuing to check with other people here, the more of us working to attract local traders, the more likely that this will succeed.  While I trust that Sofia's people can take care of any unwanted attention this may attract, the main concern is talking people into visiting a settlement that's relatively unknown.

Thank you. I've already convinced a cou.msgid: Thank you.  I've already convinced a couple others to help, I should go check with Sofia for now.

Thanks, I'll look around a bit more and.msgid: Thanks, I'll look around a bit more and see if anyone else can help with this.

I'll keep asking around, then. Thanks..msgid: I'll keep asking around, then.  Thanks.

A deacon from a local parish church. Th.msgid: A deacon from a local parish church.  The priest unfortunately left sometime before all this started and I've never heard from him since.  I fear the worst may have happened, but as it is there is already so much to tend to.

What is there to tend to?.msgid: What is there to tend to?

Many of the people here are struggling t.msgid: Many of the people here are struggling to get by and survive, and there is little that one man can do to help that.  What I can do however is help keep their spirits up, tend to the dead and dying best as I'm able as well.  I am at their service as best as I am able, no matter their faith.

Perhaps I could check on them for you?.msgid: Perhaps I could check on them for you?

Any way I could do to help with that?.msgid: Any way I could do to help with that?

Thank you. I'm hopeful they'll be able.msgid: Thank you.  I'm hopeful they'll be able to take care of themselves, for now I plan to stay here and help out as best as I can.  I know this isn't much, but here.  It's the least I could do.

Greetings, Brother. This is a sacred pl.msgid: Greetings, Brother.  This is a sacred place.

Greetings, Sister. This is a sacred pla.msgid: Greetings, Sister.  This is a sacred place.

A pleasant surprise to see you working w.msgid: A pleasant surprise to see you working with us.  What do you require?

You are not welcome here sanguinist. St.msgid: You are not welcome here sanguinist.  State your intentions.

Welcome, Keeper. What do you require?.msgid: Welcome, Keeper.  What do you require?

Servant of the otherworldly, you are wel.msgid: Servant of the otherworldly, you are welcome here, so long as you cause no trouble.

Welcome back. What do you need?.msgid: Welcome back.  What do you need?

I can sense the touch of the otherworldl.msgid: I can sense the touch of the otherworldly about you.  For what purpose are you here?

[MISSION] Sofia asked that I recruit tra.msgid: [MISSION] Sofia asked that I recruit traders or other assistance at the center.  Any advice for that?

[MISSION] Sofia asked me to investigate.msgid: [MISSION] Sofia asked me to investigate a lead on a remnant of the Keepers.  She said you knew more about that?
[MISSION] Sofia asked me to investigate a lead on a band of renegade Sanguine Shrikes.  Do you have any advice?

[MISSION] Nicholas asked me to investiga.msgid: [MISSION] Nicholas asked me to investigate a research facility for a component he needs.  Do you have any advice?

So, how are things working out with the.msgid: So, how are things working out with the new arrivals so far?

Are there any others of us left?.msgid: Are there any others of us left?

What other arcane groups are out there?.msgid: What other arcane groups are out there?

What can you tell me about your group?.msgid: What can you tell me about your group?

What can I do to help?.msgid: What can I do to help?

Alright, I think that's everything we ne.msgid: Alright, I think that's everything we need to track this anomaly down.

Anything I can do to help?.msgid: Anything I can do to help?

I've never been to the center myself, so.msgid: I've never been to the center myself, so I'm not sure what to suggest.  More hands to help build and hunt would be nice, though I suppose a source of trade would be useful, to keep our supplies well stocked.  I'll trust you to use your discretion.

Most of our order had little familiarity.msgid: Most of our order had little familiarity with these laboratories.  If we knew then what we knew now, we would've tried to force our way into every last one of them.  I do, however, recall that site was the subject of an investigation by one of our urban contacts, a Purifier like Nicholas.  Shortly before all this boiled over.

He'd led a small hunting party with him.msgid: He'd led a small hunting party with him to track a shipment, part of the intel-gathering that produced the list that allowed you to identify as a threat.  They didn't identify anything anomalous but there was mention of human trafficking, possibly experimentation.  The hunters with him were told to hold back while he attempted to sneak in.

I'll see what I find, then..msgid: I'll see what I find, then.

They lost him, waited over a day before.msgid: They lost him, waited over a day before leaving.  They were instructed not to assault the facility due to the risk of too many of our people being exposed, even if his life was at risk.  That place is going to be dangerous, even if they've succumbed to the apocalypse by now.  However good the intentions of their main project might have been, there's no telling what evils they might have inflicted on the world in the process.

I see. Thank you for the information..msgid: I see.  Thank you for the information.

Good. I've taken the time to speak with.msgid: Good.  I've taken the time to speak with the others, pass the word around, and study our maps.  I think between what you've brought in and what the other scouts were able to find out, we have a fix on the source of this anomaly.  I want to take some time to prepare yourself, then see me when you're ready.  This may prove to be a difficult fight.

Visit the center first and foremost, but.msgid: Visit the center first and foremost, but any contact that has extensive involvement with traders and explorers might know something.  Get at least five confirmed locations and we should have a better understanding of where the epicenter might be.

Bring what you found to Sofia, she shoul.msgid: Bring what you found to Sofia, she should be able to help.  I'll look into consulting with the others as well, until you come back with anything.

Who do you suggest asking about this?.msgid: Who do you suggest asking about this?

What else can you tell me?.msgid: What else can you tell me?

Anomalous monsters in small groups, some.msgid: Anomalous monsters in small groups, sometimes lone attackers.  Most of the attacks were at night, and most of the victims attacked during the day got away unscathed.

Anomalous, but more dangerous and active.msgid: Anomalous, but more dangerous and active at night.  Any idea what that might be?

Any information on what sort of monsters.msgid: Any information on what sort of monsters attacked them?

I have something else to ask about..msgid: I have something else to ask about.

I have a few ideas myself, but I don't h.msgid: I have a few ideas myself, but I don't have any first-hand accounts by the survivors so far to confirm what we're up against.  The most detail we've received so far concerns the most recent second-hand account we've received.  You might be able to find something out by following what little lead we have.

Worth a try, point me in the right direc.msgid: Worth a try, point me in the right direction.

What intel did that lead give you?.msgid: What intel did that lead give you?

I have something else to ask about first.msgid: I have something else to ask about first.

Alright. I'll give you directions as be.msgid: Alright.  I'll give you directions as best as I can.  This should lead you to the last site where they broke camp before their return.  They left some of their gear with the bodies, and there might be some clues left behind.  Search for any items that stand out, possibly anomalous materials they might have scavenged from the region.

All I can tell you is to be careful. Th.msgid: All I can tell you is to be careful.  They let their guard down and assumed they were in the clear, it's possible whatever killed most of the survivors is still in the area.  It's also likely they may have brought some anomalous artifact with them that could have attracted monsters to them.

A small group of survivors were travelin.msgid: A small group of survivors were traveling through the area where these attacks have been happening, a few suffered some severe injuries attempting to break contact.  They made it some distance before making camp to rest and try to treat their wounded.  Best they could to was bury the ones that succumbed to their wounds before something ran them off.  I know the location of that campsite at least, if you think it's worth investigating.

No thanks, let's try something else..msgid: No thanks, let's try something else.

The attackers are evidently nocturnal, p.msgid: The attackers are evidently nocturnal, probably why the attacks are most common at night.  What few reports we have suggest they aren't natural wildlife or undead.  If there was an incursion of otherworldly abominations, you'd think we'd have an easier time pinpointing the cause.  The attacks are scattered over a wide area however, so it might just be that we have such a broad area to search.

It could be provoked by a more subtle in.msgid: It could be provoked by a more subtle incident, like what broke the back of the Keepers.

They might not be physical interlopers,.msgid: They might not be physical interlopers, they could be like summoned monsters.

Any way we could narrow down the locatio.msgid: Any way we could narrow down the location?

I need time to think about this..msgid: I need time to think about this.

That's possible. And I know that tracki.msgid: That's possible.  And I know that tracking down an incident like that would be difficult.  You might be able to make some sense out of one of the most recent attacks I have information on.

I think I might be able to help track th.msgid: I think I might be able to help track the cause down, actually.

Alright, tell me what you have in mind..msgid: Alright, tell me what you have in mind.

If you're certain. You're one of the Ke.msgid: If you're certain.  You're one of the Keepers Chosen, aren't you?  Whatever strange magic is at work might be something you can make use of.  I have a rough area mapped out, if you have one of their artifacts at hand?

I do. Show me what I need to do for thi.msgid: I do.  Show me what I need to do for this to work.

Nevermind, let's start from the beginnin.msgid: Nevermind, let's start from the beginning.

I'll need to retrieve the artifact first.msgid: I'll need to retrieve the artifact first.  I'll be back later.

We'll trace the area here, with a shadow.msgid: We'll trace the area here, with a shadow gem from one of the conventional interlopers, the resonance from your blade, and one of my compatriots providing a mask… just stay right there.

It's like a sort of divination, using an.msgid: It's like a sort of divination, using an anomalous item with a connection to the monsters behind these attacks, the gem in this case.  And with your… connection to that entity, if this is similar to what affected the Keepers' holy site, your blade should react to this ritual…

There. I can see it through the mask, h.msgid: There.  I can see it through the mask, how the artifact and the gem react when used in this manner.  Give me a moment to consult with the others and speak to me when you're ready.  I hope this actually leads us the right way.

Indeed. I know a possible way you could.msgid: Indeed.  I know a possible way you could help.  I don't have many exact locations of attacks to narrow things down, but I do have the location of a related incident.  Some survivors made camp after dealing with attacks from these monsters, and I suspect they left behind anomalous findings that might help us locate them.  You seem to have an eye for this, I'd like to ask for you to investigate.

I accept, tell me where to go..msgid: I accept, tell me where to go.

Can you tell me more, first?.msgid: Can you tell me more, first?

A few examples of intermittent anomalous.msgid: A few examples of intermittent anomalous hazards in the general hazard, often erratic and with no evidence of a pattern.  Moreover, the few reports of people who have lingered in the area have reported a wave of bad dreams, strange visions.  Seems to describe monsters that aren't among the usual interlopers.

This seems familiar. The Keepers have s.msgid: This seems familiar.  The Keepers have suffered a similar fate in their foremost holy site, haven't they?

Maybe there's a way to get a more exact.msgid: Maybe there's a way to get a more exact location?

My name is Johnathan Leone. I was among.msgid: My name is Johnathan Leone.  I was among the founders of our order, as was Sofia it seems.  Before the founding, I held the title of Grandmaster among the order I was once a part of.

Indeed. Before the founding, we were a.msgid: Indeed.  Before the founding, we were a local religious institute under solemn vow.  I suspect the Church would frown upon our present conduct, our practices now so closely entwined with our heathen brethren.

Sofia would know more of the place. Sad.msgid: Sofia would know more of the place.  Sadly I'm not ordained to serve the role of whoever originally tended to this place, and so sacred duties fall to Thane McKinnon.

For now, I oversee the training and prep.msgid: For now, I oversee the training and preparation of the others here, and organize scouting and supply runs.  Check with me and perhaps I'll have something for you do.

We are not alone out there. I am aware.msgid: We are not alone out there.  I am aware of other hunting parties still hanging on, though getting a fix on their location is difficult.  I've given Sofia what information I have, she might be able to do something with it if you ask her.

To bring justice to those who would enda.msgid: To bring justice to those who would endanger humanity, if we must.  To mend the growing wound In The Veil Between Worlds, if we can.  To guard and guide so that a dangerous path may be avoided, so we shall.  So long as the Sun shines upon the Earth.  We are hunters of the wicked and otherworldly, and protectors of the innocent.  At least, we strive to be.  There weren't that many of us, and being scattered as small parties meant that not all of us adhered to proper conduct, though it never reached the point of dissension and division.

Welcome back. It is good to see you..msgid: Welcome back.  It is good to see you.

Cause no trouble sanguinist, and you wil.msgid: Cause no trouble sanguinist, and you will be welcome here.

Good to see you, Brother. What can I do.msgid: Good to see you, Brother.  What can I do for you?

Good to see you, Sister. What can I do.msgid: Good to see you, Sister.  What can I do for you?

Hi there, how can I help you?.msgid: Hi there, how can I help you?

Are you the only ones left?.msgid: Are you the only ones left?

[MISSION] The people who helped me find.msgid: [MISSION] The people who helped me find that information were hoping for us to help them in return.

So, you wanted to talk about what we fou.msgid: So, you wanted to talk about what we found?

I'm ready, what do you need?.msgid: I'm ready, what do you need?

There are a few other isolated contacts.msgid: There are a few other isolated contacts that I'm aware of, but getting in touch with them will prove difficult.  Thane McKinnon and I will do our best, but for all I know you might be the last of our network of contacts remaining out there.

Sofia and I are working to track down an.msgid: Sofia and I are working to track down and get in touch with others, but I'm not certain how many more hunting parties, nor any external contacts, are still alive out there.  Only time will tell.

Well there's you, obviously! You're one.msgid: Well there's you, obviously!  You're one of the urban contacts as well, I can tell that practically by instinct, that's gotta count for something right?  And then there's the actual hunters all over here, and… well, I dunno other than that.  Nick might know more, I hope.

There's everyone here, possibly a few ot.msgid: There's everyone here, possibly a few other contacts Nicholas might know more about.  But, we're here, Sofia and her pals are here, and we're surviving.  That's better than nothing, better than a lot of people can say, right?  Well, except those aforementioned people wouldn't be able to say anything because they're dead, but you know what I mean…

Same network of contacts as you. Some o.msgid: Same network of contacts as you.  Some of us handled investigation and research, some dealt with actually getting in and grabbing whatever we were after.  From what I saw personally, most of it was just studying anomalies and staying in touch with outsiders to keep tabs on things.  Didn't ever seem to be a lot of us out there either.

We were part of an informal network of c.msgid: We were part of an informal network of contacts for our brethren.  Aside from a few officials willing to look the other way, and some eccentric collectors offering their support, most of us were essentially scouts.  We'd investigate leads on potential anomalies in more… public areas, and secure them if we could.  There weren't really that many of us, just as the Cleansing Flame as a whole was stretched thin across the region.

With how you've helped us out, I could t.msgid: With how you've helped us out, I could try to teach you a few things.  I have experience with Capacitance, Consecrate, and Opening, should you need it.  That said, I will need a few Golden Scales for the deed.  Binding a spell pattern safely takes a special touch, and the local scavengers don't part with materials easily.

What can you tell me about Capacitance?.msgid: What can you tell me about Capacitance?

What can you tell me about Consecrate?.msgid: What can you tell me about Consecrate?

What can you tell me about Opening?.msgid: What can you tell me about Opening?

I already know all of those, nevermind..msgid: I already know all of those, nevermind.

A specialty of the Cleansing Flame's ass.msgid: A specialty of the Cleansing Flame's associates and allies who dealt with bionics.  It dumps the energy it calls up directly into power storage, so it's only useful if you have any capacity for bionic power set up.  Not good to use in a fight either, doesn't hurt or anything but your muscles freeze up when it activates.  I'll need 4 Golden Scales to cover everything that a proper ritual will require.

Consecrate is designed to purify the ter.msgid: Consecrate is designed to purify the terrain, either petrifying or disintegrating most anomalous or otherworldly alterations to the landscape.  Less well-known is what it does to most otherworldly monsters caught in its effect.  It's not intended as an offensive spell first and foremost, but it'll damage most such monsters and leave them reeling.  I'll need 4 Golden Scales to cover everything that a proper ritual will require.

An extremely versatile entry tool. Most.msgid: An extremely versatile entry tool.  Most locked doors will yield silently, windows slide open, metal garage doors, what-have-you.  Some field reports have mentioned it clearing rubble or a few other sorts of obstacles too.  I'll need 3 Golden Scales to cover everything that a proper ritual will require.

I see. What information do we need to s.msgid: I see.  What information do we need to send over?  There's a lot in here after all, and we'll need to keep some of this information to ourselves until we've secured whatever we can concerning Project Kairos.

The doctor at the refugee center wanted.msgid: The doctor at the refugee center wanted information on locations likely to have vital medical supplies.

The local scavengers wanted information.msgid: The local scavengers wanted information on resources and threats in nearby labs.

Seems reasonable, then. I'll get in tou.msgid: Seems reasonable, then.  I'll get in touch with them and work out what information I can get out of this.  Check up on them sometime later and they will probably be glad to hear back from you.

I suppose it wouldn't hurt, though I'd p.msgid: I suppose it wouldn't hurt, though I'd prefer to advise them to give most of the old labs a wide berth, just to be safe.  I'll get in touch and work out what they need to know.  You should probably check on them later.

Anything else to be done then?.msgid: Anything else to be done then?

Research from the hermit, and the shrike.msgid: Research from the hermit, and the shrikes?

If we're going to get any real use out o.msgid: If we're going to get any real use out of it, it needs to be actually used in the field.  I've documented everything I can about the components that went into this, and some day we might be able to replicate the results without bespoke anomalous materials from facilities that don't exist anymore.  I'd like you to make use of it, it's risky having our only working example out there but I'm willing to take that risk if it'll do some good.

I'll give it a try then..msgid: I'll give it a try then.

Keep it for now, maybe another time..msgid: Keep it for now, maybe another time.

Here you go then. It works much like th.msgid: Here you go then.  It works much like the Keepers' relics, if you're close to a portal for long enough it should collapse, and that can be used to power it up.  That much energy would be very dangerous if released in the wrong way, or it was used for destructive purposes, but I figured out a way to make it convert that energy into life force.  A foil to the Sanguine Order's well-established practice of drawing power from life energy, a further side benefit to securing their research I guess.  You'll see for yourself what it does, but it's quite fitting for something meant to mend old wounds.

Thanks, one more thing before I go….msgid: Thanks, one more thing before I go…

Thank you, I'll see you later then..msgid: Thank you, I'll see you later then.

And what do you plan to do with it?.msgid: And what do you plan to do with it?

What can you tell me about that componen.msgid: What can you tell me about that component?

Do you need me to do anything now that i.msgid: Do you need me to do anything now that it's ready?

How did the Keepers and Sanguine Order c.msgid: How did the Keepers and Sanguine Order contribute?

This list you brought me shows us a lot.msgid: This list you brought me shows us a lot more information on what was being shipped where.  If we're lucky, this will lead us to whatever is left of Project Kairos.

What else do you know about Project Kair.msgid: What else do you know about Project Kairos?

What have you found so far?.msgid: What have you found so far?

Tell me what we're looking for, then..msgid: Tell me what we're looking for, then.

Let me get back to you on that..msgid: Let me get back to you on that.

They were constructing a facility of som.msgid: They were constructing a facility of some sort to test portal manipulation.  All these materials were going towards devising a way to seal portals remotely and increase dimensional stability.  I don't know if they succeeded or not, but we might be able to use their progress together with our own research.

It's a lot to go through, but I can see.msgid: It's a lot to go through, but I can see records of medical supplies, robotics materials, all sorts of things going through different sites.  I've made note of several shipments related to portal generation, rift lensing, spatial manipulation and the like.  From our own research so far, all of those are likely to be essential for a project like this.

There's a whole web of shipments concern.msgid: There's a whole web of shipments concerning the sort of technologies that would be useful for this sort of project, and over ninety percent of the relevant anomalous materials on this manifest end up in a single research facility.  This is exactly what I was hoping to find, a buildup of materials that briefly continued even into the last few shipments that made it out when this all boiled over.  When you're ready, I'll have a briefing prepared for you.

The most important research we have come.msgid: The most important research we have comes from the intel Sofia gathered before we arrived here.  The Keepers in particular had some valuable insights into sealing portals.  We may have our differences, but they had a genuine advantage that we've never been able to replicate before.  But if we can salvage what's left of Project Kairos and combine it with their findings, I'm hoping that will change.

I'm still trying to make sense of all th.msgid: I'm still trying to make sense of all the information you brought in, but I have a possible lead.  I might need your help to get more information to help put everything together.

Where can I get that information?.msgid: Where can I get that information?

Tell me what I need to do..msgid: Tell me what I need to do.

The notes concern an attempt to track do.msgid: The notes concern an attempt to track down something called Project Kairos.  Some sort of portal research that persisted a bit longer after things boiled over, when most of the other labs had already fallen apart.  That data contained information on the last couple supply movements during and after Zero Day, science facilities suspected to be connected to this project, other clues here and there.  But we haven't pinpointed the location.

How do we find it then?.msgid: How do we find it then?

I need to think it over..msgid: I need to think it over.

That's what I'm hoping you could help wi.msgid: That's what I'm hoping you could help with.  There has to be someone who knows more about this, or failing that, where we could find more information.

I'm just about done getting a summary of.msgid: I'm just about done getting a summary of the project, known locations of supply shipments, and what little else we know copied.  Talk to me when you're ready and I just might have an idea for how we can get what we need.

Slowly but surely, things are coming tog.msgid: Slowly but surely, things are coming together.  We'll manage, I think.  Just keep an eye out for any threats to humanity, do what can be done to help other communities, and there may be hope for the next generation yet.

Greetings. You are welcome here, so lon.msgid: Greetings.  You are welcome here, so long as you cause no trouble.

Greetings. I know you are, or were, a f.msgid: Greetings.  I know you are, or were, a follower of the Path to Power.  For what purpose have you come here?

Welcome, Brother. I knew we were not al.msgid: Welcome, Brother.  I knew we were not alone just yet.

Welcome, Sister. I knew we were not alo.msgid: Welcome, Sister.  I knew we were not alone just yet.

Greetings. I hope that we can work toge.msgid: Greetings.  I hope that we can work together.

Greetings, Keeper. The others cannot se.msgid: Greetings, Keeper.  The others cannot see the mark of your god upon you, as I can.  We need not be enemies, if your intentions are peaceful.

Welcome, traveler. You may rest here if.msgid: Welcome, traveler.  You may rest here if in need, meager though our sanctum may be.

[MISSION] I need another copy of the tra.msgid: [MISSION] I need another copy of the trade arrangements, please.

[MISSION] What can you tell me about the.msgid: [MISSION] What can you tell me about the "strange grove" Johnathan asked me to investigate?

[MISSION] What can you tell me about thi.msgid: [MISSION] What can you tell me about this sanctum Johnathan sent me to investigate?

[MISSION] What can you tell me about the.msgid: [MISSION] What can you tell me about these sanguinists that Johnathan has asked me to deal with?

[MISSION] The deacon at the refugee cent.msgid: [MISSION] The deacon at the refugee center asked me to check up on you.

[MISSION] Johnathan sent me to investiga.msgid: [MISSION] Johnathan sent me to investigate an anomaly, I found this journal.  Can you interpret it?
[MISSION] Johnathan sent me to investigate an anomaly, I found a strange gem there.  What do you make of it?

[MISSION] Johnathan asked me about an an.msgid: [MISSION] Johnathan asked me about an anomaly he's investigating and told me about a survivor campsite that might have a clue.  Any advice?
[MISSION] Johnathan asked me about an anomaly he's investigating, and suggested I ask for information from other people.  Who should I ask?

[MISSION] About this \"bone charm\" you.msgid: [MISSION] About this "bone charm" you asked me to make…

What can you tell me about the others?.msgid: What can you tell me about the others?

I'm not here to fight you..msgid: I'm not here to fight you.

I have my own reasons for being here..msgid: I have my own reasons for being here.

I have been chosen by them, though I am.msgid: I have been chosen by them, though I am no Keeper.

I am not here for a fight. He From Beyo.msgid: I am not here for a fight.  He From Beyond The Veil has seen fit to ensure our meeting.

We have been both allies and enemies in.msgid: We have been both allies and enemies in the past.  I am trusting that the cycle will not repeat.

I was told about this place by the merch.msgid: I was told about this place by the merchant at the refugee center, and decided to see if things are any better here.

I was sent by the deacon at the refugee.msgid: I was sent by the deacon at the refugee center, to check up on you.

Oh, okay. Should be easy enough to repl.msgid: Oh, okay.  Should be easy enough to replace, since the list is a bit short.  Our needs and resources haven't changed at the moment anyway.  Here you go.

I see. I'm glad that he's doing alright.msgid: I see.  I'm glad that he's doing alright over there.  If you get the chance to stop by, be sure to tell him we're doing okay.  Should put his mind at ease, as I'm sure he's needed over there.

An old arcanist enclave, right? I'm afr.msgid: An old arcanist enclave, right?  I'm afraid I don't know much of practical value beyond Johnathan's own judgment on the potential threat.  But I do recall a bit about the place prior to its infestation.

What do you know about what the place us.msgid: What do you know about what the place used to be?

Know anything about what happened to the.msgid: Know anything about what happened to the place?

Another time, perhaps. Thank you though.msgid: Another time, perhaps.  Thank you though.

It was used by a group of scholars, myst.msgid: It was used by a group of scholars, mystics, and such.  Long before all this started, before the great wounds in The Veil, even before our group became involved in all these strange things.

What did they do there, back then?.msgid: What did they do there, back then?

I see. I have something else to ask you.msgid: I see.  I have something else to ask you about the place.

I see. That's all for now..msgid: I see.  That's all for now.

Studied, wrote, whatever they researched.msgid: Studied, wrote, whatever they researched there laid the foundations for many other practices you've surely seen hints of.  Only thing it was missing was a way to turn hypothesis into practice, and others found that out once the people there abandoned the place.

As far as I know, they abandoned the pla.msgid: As far as I know, they abandoned the place and it simply fell into ruin.  I had assumed that they lacked the means to put any of their ideas into practice back then, but if there are anomalies afflicting the place than there must have been something to allow these problems to flare up so long after they left.

What can you tell me about the layout of.msgid: What can you tell me about the layout of the place?

Like any proper sanctum, there's a main.msgid: Like any proper sanctum, there's a main hall just beyond the entrance, common rooms for the benefit of any people sheltered there, and downstairs past the shrine.  Workspaces, archives, armories and the like will be downstairs, and they're likely to be infested by abominations given what what others have mentioned.  The main room there will be divided into hallways by the stone supports and walls, you might be able to use them to keep any monsters down there bunched up.  As for what's beyond that, I…

Maybe it would be better to ask about so.msgid: Maybe it would be better to ask about something else.

It's fine. That's all for now..msgid: It's fine.  That's all for now.

The floor below that used to be our ritu.msgid: The floor below that used to be our ritual room, along with the tomb for those that've fallen in battle.  What the others said, that part of the structure has been completely subverted by some unknown intrusion from Beyond.  It's bad enough that those who fell trying to hold those monsters back went unburied, but gods know what happened to those laid to rest there.  You'll need to take down a barrier sealing off the stairs, you'll see one of our swords.  You'll be able to remove it to dispel the barrier easily enough.  Whatever you do, please come back safely.

I'd like to ask about something else, pl.msgid: I'd like to ask about something else, please.

Thank you. That's it for now..msgid: Thank you.  That's it for now.

When all this started, many places suffe.msgid: When all this started, many places suffered anomalies and hazards of various sorts.  The mere nature of our work down there, dismantling dangerous objects recovered on hunts, evidently allowed such things to happen even there, despite all our efforts to be cautious.  The hunters there held off what came crawling out from Beyond as best as they could, but they couldn't… I'm sorry.  It's unavoidable in our line of work, but we lost so many down there, that day.  Whatever fate the gods mandate for them, I hope they are at peace.

You have seen the worst of your order..msgid: You have seen the worst of your order.  I would advise caution, and be prepared for a fight even if they recognize that you're one of them.  That you pursue this task means I can trust you to do what's right.  They're preying upon people just as the Order has for decades, and not even the threat of humanity's extinction has swayed them.  It's unfortunate, as killing each other is the last thing we should be doing in times like these, but they must be brought to justice.

The Sanguine Order is dangerous. It is.msgid: The Sanguine Order is dangerous.  It is not merely their dabbling in dangerous forces, they were a threat even before their discoveries.  They are murderers, worse than any petty bandit.  While I am hopeful that some of their number might face the threat of humanity's end, and come to understand this cannot continue, this group has been confirmed to still be just as senseless in their actions as the Order typically is.  Do not trust them, and do not underestimate them.

\"Dii supra et infra, dōnēs nobis virtus.msgid: "Dii supra et infra, dōnēs nobis virtus."  I'll deal with them.

We'll see what comes of it, hunter..msgid: We'll see what comes of it, hunter.

So be it. \"No matter the cost, no matt.msgid: So be it.  "No matter the cost, no matter what we must do, for the strength and safety of this world…"

Let me take a look at this. Looks like.msgid: Let me take a look at this.  Looks like the entries describe a series of strange events and dreams experienced ever since passing through the anomalous region.  Lot of rambling, bit out of order too.  Like they skipped a few pages then filled in the blanks with later entries… but, I think I see roughly how things went down.

A few of their early entries, the first.msgid: A few of their early entries, the first few days into the journey, references nearby landmarks.  The last one before things go off the rails mentions a recently-built otherworldly structure in their path, and I can confirm which location that is.  Given the description suggests something anomalous happened there more recently, it's possible that the source of this took up residence there.  Go talk to Johnathan, tell him we have what we need.

Thank you. One more thing before I go..msgid: Thank you.  One more thing before I go.

That looks like an artifact made from a.msgid: That looks like an artifact made from a shadow gem.  The alterations made to it aren't human, that much is clear.  It's burnt-out too, but I can figure out what it did when it activated.  In fact, given what we know this likely caused the secondary attack at their campsite.  Let me get a mask from one of the others.

It still has some lingering aftereffects.msgid: It still has some lingering aftereffects.  Like a trail of energy burnt into what remains of its enchantments, essentially pointing in the direction of the source as of the moment it activated.  That'd be no good to us just standing here, but we know the rough area of the anomalous region, and we know where it was when it activated.  Go tell Johnathan we have what we need to pinpoint the source.

I heard about that incident. Gods, if I.msgid: I heard about that incident.  Gods, if I recall they lost three people there.  They'd buried two who had succumbed to previous injuries, before something attacked them.  The third stayed behind to buy the others time to escape with their lives.

Any anomalous artifacts you can find in.msgid: Any anomalous artifacts you can find in the items they left behind, any books or other written intel might be useful too.  If you find something, return to Johnathan with it first, then if needed he'll ask you to show it to me.  I pray that you will return safe, and victorious over whatever caused this.

You had to have known what you were walk.msgid: You had to have known what you were walking into.  Either you are here to make peace, or else there is a trick at play here.  If so, know that we are watching.  Now please, for what purpose have you come here?

You are correct. I'm not here for a fig.msgid: You are correct.  I'm not here for a fight.

[ATTACK] To finish what my fellows start.msgid: [ATTACK] To finish what my fellows started.  I need no tricks to put your kind down.

So I see. If you are here with honest i.msgid: So I see.  If you are here with honest intent, I can guide you.  Let us set things right.

We'll see what can be done..msgid: We'll see what can be done.

I am willing to trust you, if you prove.msgid: I am willing to trust you, if you prove yourself.  Your reasons are your own, but remember that we will not let our guard down.

I see. However you accomplished that, I.msgid: I see.  However you accomplished that, I'm impressed.  I hope that you have learned caution and temperance regarding powers from the Beyond.  I can offer any guidance I can, if you accept it.

So it seems. Whether your god or those.msgid: So it seems.  Whether your god or those we follow, our meeting was fated.  I'm certain of it.  This is an opportunity to work together.

You have my word. Neither of us can aff.msgid: You have my word.  Neither of us can afford to be enemies anymore.

We never learned much about these labs,.msgid: We never learned much about these labs, not until after reports coming in from scavengers.  If they were involved in the arcane, or some other anomalous activity, then the Veil might be especially weak there.  We've already heard stories of abominations both earthly and otherworldly infesting these places, a lab of this nature will likely be even worse.  Be well-armed, make sure you have a path of escape before forcing your way in deeper.  Any written intel or warning signs you find down there might be of vital importance.

What do you wish to know? As I said, I.msgid: What do you wish to know?  As I said, I can explain why we need one if you wish.  I can also try to help advise you on what creatures might be useful to hunt for the materials needed to make one.

It's a protective spell, I'm guessing?.msgid: It's a protective spell, I'm guessing?

What sort of ritual does this entail?.msgid: What sort of ritual does this entail?

I'm not sure how it'd help protect this.msgid: I'm not sure how it'd help protect this place.

This just seems like a very strange requ.msgid: This just seems like a very strange request.

Where would I find the materials needed.msgid: Where would I find the materials needed to make one of these things?

Never mind, I'll figure it out..msgid: Never mind, I'll figure it out.

So how do I go about making one?.msgid: So how do I go about making one?

That's all for now, thank you..msgid: That's all for now, thank you.

A protective spell that will shroud this.msgid: A protective spell that will shroud this location from interlopers in the area, and reduce the risk of any anomalies.  Without that, we can't use every tool at our disposal to safeguard this place to the fullest.

It's a ritual to protect this location..msgid: It's a ritual to protect this location.  I would hope that you've gained some familiarity with the strange beasts and otherworldly phenomenon.  I suspect it would also be useful to you, to go hunting for creatures of this sort to see for yourself how abnormal things have become, and adding a personal touch to this component would also be a useful learning experience of its own.

Understandable, the purpose of it concer.msgid: Understandable, the purpose of it concerns ritual protection of this place.  It may seem of little importance to you, but remember that hunting down the materials needed to make one means at least one less abomination endangering other people.  That, and what you might learn of these hazards now afflicting our reality during your hunt, will offer valuable experience.  I hope that is acceptable, if nothing else?

Fine, any advice on what to hunt for?.msgid: Fine, any advice on what to hunt for?

Materials used to make these items are c.msgid: Materials used to make these items are commonly wrested from beasts such as what other survivors call "grackens" as well as "krecks" which have been seen lingering near tears in reality, or lurking near the remains of slain soldiers and other groups.  Abominations some have termed hunting horrors and flying polyps may also be a source, though more dangerous.

Guess we'll see what I can do..msgid: Guess we'll see what I can do.

Some of the undead, most prominently the.msgid: Some of the undead, most prominently the ones contorting into predatory forms, and those afflicted by bony growths taking over their bodies, have been known to yield such materials as well.  Even some living beings native to this world, afflicted by mutation and contorted into forms no natural process could mimic, can display anomalous properties that would linger in their bodies well after death.

That's all for now, I guess..msgid: That's all for now, I guess.

They've been helpful so far. Supplies a.msgid: They've been helpful so far.  Supplies are coming in and going out, slowly but surely.  And they seem to be getting along well enough with the others, we might eventually gain recruits thanks to your efforts.

Before all this started, an old parish c.msgid: Before all this started, an old parish church.  Many of our sanctums took the form of any church, hof, or other such place sympathetic to our cause.  I'd known the priest here for years, and he sheltered us many times despite the heathen nature of many of us, including myself.  This was a natural choice on realizing how dire the situation was, though we found the place abandoned at some point during the chaos.

What did you mean by heathen?.msgid: What did you mean by heathen?

And what cause would that be?.msgid: And what cause would that be?

I see. That is all for now..msgid: I see.  That is all for now.

Our order was composed of people from va.msgid: Our order was composed of people from various religions.  Not only Abrahamic ones of various sorts, but those that would be considered pagan.  Asatruan, in my case.  Over time our practices mingled, a shared influence affecting our approach to the arcane.

Magic? I'm still not sure I can believe.msgid: Magic?  I'm still not sure I can believe that.

Sofia McKinnon, entitled as Thane by our.msgid: Sofia McKinnon, entitled as Thane by our founding, and a Sister of the Cleansing Flame.

Is this all that's left of us?.msgid: Is this all that's left of us?

So long as the Sun shines upon the Earth.msgid: So long as the Sun shines upon the Earth…

A religious order. Of many faiths, alon.msgid: A religious order.  Of many faiths, along many paths.  We were never that large in size, mostly just a few local communities united by the depredations of a cult.  Before any of these arcane goings-on happened, but when the cracks in the Veil began to show its effects, we adapted just as the Sanguine Order did.

And who were the Sanguine Order?.msgid: And who were the Sanguine Order?

Our term for whatever effect seems to be.msgid: Our term for whatever effect seems to be linked to some of the monsters that have invaded this realm.  You may have seen these rifts or holes during your travels, or heard others report of them.  Things coming out of them?  Whatever caused them, there has to be some way to prevent things from getting worse.

A reminder of our history. Before our f.msgid: A reminder of our history.  Before our founding, when we were a few disparate groups of various religions.  Including followers of the old gods such as myself, who used titles and ranks where now we are merely Brothers and Sisters.

A few others among our order, some havin.msgid: A few others among our order, some having had contact with our fellows working closer to the cities.  Grandmaster Leone seems to be the most senior of the group, and he provided me with a lot of information I'll need to examine closely.  Might lead us to other survivors to get in touch with.  Might be a good idea to speak with him as well.

There are a few Magic Signs I could pass.msgid: There are a few Magic Signs I could pass on to you.  Since you've aided us, I could teach you the use of Heat Ward, Poison Armor, or Ward Against Evil, if you don't already know them.  I will need a given amount of Golden Scales, to cover the materials and essence that go into copying these secrets into a form others can use.

What can you tell me about Heat Ward?.msgid: What can you tell me about Heat Ward?

What can you tell me about Poison Armor?.msgid: What can you tell me about Poison Armor?

What can you tell me about Ward Against.msgid: What can you tell me about Ward Against Evil?

There's nothing more I could learn from.msgid: There's nothing more I could learn from you.  Thanks anyway.

It's a spell some of our hunters learn t.msgid: It's a spell some of our hunters learn to protect against overheating and smoke inhalation.  It's not enough to negate being immersed in flame, but you won't catch alight from it.  I'll need 4 Golden Scales to cover the cost of materials and for warding the ritual preparations.

It guards the body against toxins of nea.msgid: It guards the body against toxins of nearly any sort.  Poison gas, venom from mutant beasts, I've seen it ease signs of radiation sickness as well.  I'll need 3 Golden Scales to cover the cost of materials and for warding the ritual preparations.

This is a sacred protective spell agains.msgid: This is a sacred protective spell against otherworldly influences.  Things that draw attention from Beyond or instability on the victim, likely the most common example.  I'll need 4 Golden Scales to cover the cost of materials and for warding the ritual preparations.

The entrance and kitchen have a handful.msgid: The entrance and kitchen have a handful of things you may use if you are in need.  Beyond that we don't have much to spare, but I will offer you what I can.  We've taken to using measured blanks of gold in lieu of currency, which we used to use for repairing some of our items.  The others can vouch for the purity and weight being standardized.

Welcome, Brother. May you find peace he.msgid: Welcome, Brother.  May you find peace here.

Welcome, Sister. May you find peace her.msgid: Welcome, Sister.  May you find peace here.

Greetings. I'm hopeful that we will con.msgid: Greetings.  I'm hopeful that we will continue to work together.

For what purpose are you here? Others w.msgid: For what purpose are you here?  Others will have what you seek.

Greetings, Keeper. How can I assist you.msgid: Greetings, Keeper.  How can I assist you?

I do not know if I have what you seek, K.msgid: I do not know if I have what you seek, Keeper.  But welcome, regardless.

Welcome. May you find peace here..msgid: Welcome.  May you find peace here.

Little more than a scholar of our holy w.msgid: Little more than a scholar of our holy words, name's Matthew.  My father had been among the founders as Sofia and Jonathan were, and passed the title of his old order down to me.

A collection of scholars and theologians.msgid: A collection of scholars and theologians.  Jonathan's group and Sofia's own preceded mine, and a fourth followed.  From there we gathered others, of an even greater range of faiths, few as we were in the end.

What else can you tell me about those gr.msgid: What else can you tell me about those groups?

The Grandmaster's kin came from a self-s.msgid: The Grandmaster's kin came from a self-styled knightly order, Catholic in origin.  Sofia's, a fellowship of neo-pagans.  My own, predominantly Muslim.  And the fourth was pagan of another sort, if any of them remain and find this place, perhaps they'll be able to tell you more.

I know only that it had been chosen as a.msgid: I know only that it had been chosen as a sanctum.  I heard of it while visiting with a few survivors, who themselves heard of this place at some point.

I help keep records and preserve knowled.msgid: I help keep records and preserve knowledge that the others have collected.  If you have need of anything, I have gathered a few supplies and books to spare, and could trade for them if you wish.

Lost half a hunting party a few days ago.msgid: Lost half a hunting party a few days ago, along the edge of one of the old towns.  Thought nothing of it at first, but now that you mention it things sounded fishy.  Guess I'll lay out how things went down, see if that helps whatever you're trying to do.

[MISSION] I've been asked to help attrac.msgid: [MISSION] I've been asked to help attract work for another community of survivors.  Know of anyone who could help with that?

You're talking to the wrong person for t.msgid: You're talking to the wrong person for that.  If you're hitting up hunters and scavengers for work, best person to talk to would be the broker.  They arrange the contracts and such, should be in that room over there.

[MISSION] I've been asked to find inform.msgid: [MISSION] I've been asked to find information on shipments between laboratories that may have been handling anomalies.  Can you help me with that?

Do you know of any other settlements in.msgid: Do you know of any other settlements in the region?

[MISSION] Sofia sent me with the latest.msgid: [MISSION] Sofia sent me with the latest inventory for trading.

[MISSION] Can you print another copy of.msgid: [MISSION] Can you print another copy of the receipt?

[MISSION] Sofia asked me to recruit trad.msgid: [MISSION] Sofia asked me to recruit traders or other assistance.  Do you know of anyone looking for work?

Worth a shot, what'd you find out?.msgid: Worth a shot, what'd you find out?

Recently we lost contact with a caravan.msgid: Recently we lost contact with a caravan that had been coming back from exploring one of the labs.  They mentioned something about some paperwork that they were going to use to plan their next outing.  I'm willing to bet that will help the both of us.

What do you need me to do?.msgid: What do you need me to do?

The last we heard from them, they had ju.msgid: The last we heard from them, they had just fended off some raiders and broke camp at a small cave to treat their wounded and recover.  We haven't heard from them since.  I'd like you to do something for me, if you go after them.

I'm not sure I'm up for this..msgid: I'm not sure I'm up for this.

Whoever you're getting this information.msgid: Whoever you're getting this information for, I'd like for you to send it our way too.  We've been leery of sending teams anywhere near the labs because it's high risk and unknown reward.  If we had an idea what we'll find, we could make sure to steer clear of dangerous areas and investigate the ones that might be profitable to explore.

I can make sure both you and Sofia's peo.msgid: I can make sure both you and Sofia's people get it.  Deal.

I need to bring it to one of Sofia's peo.msgid: I need to bring it to one of Sofia's people first.

Didn't expect Sofia's group to have much.msgid: Didn't expect Sofia's group to have much interest in old science facilities.  Well, not my business.  So long as we get that information too, I hope that won't be a problem?

It should be fine. Go ahead..msgid: It should be fine.  Go ahead.

Here's directions to the last location w.msgid: Here's directions to the last location where we heard from them.  Be ready for anything, I have no idea what happened after we lost contact.  You'll want to look for some kind of paperwork, something about shipments between locations.  That's about all I know.

Not many holdouts large enough to call a.msgid: Not many holdouts large enough to call a settlement, but there is activity out there at least.  We have our own work on getting something set up.  There's also a small group that occasionally sends traders to visit us, they're holed up in some old rural church.  The church's deacon stops by here fairly often though, should be out in the hallway.  Talk to him and he might be able to give you directions.

Thank you. I'll be back later..msgid: Thank you.  I'll be back later.

The easier things are for them now, the.msgid: The easier things are for them now, the more value you'll get out of them later on.  Think you could do 15 scales?

What about other sources of gold and sil.msgid: What about other sources of gold and silver?

I don't have enough on hand on the momen.msgid: I don't have enough on hand on the moment.  I'll deal with this later.

I'll deal with this later, bye for now..msgid: I'll deal with this later, bye for now.

Afraid I can't. The main reason I'm wil.msgid: Afraid I can't.  The main reason I'm willing to honor their deal is because those things they use are reliable.  25 grams of three-nines-fine gold, edge reeding, the works.  I doubt they have the means to make any more, but for now they're more useful for trade than any old melted jewelry.

They'll be even more valuable if their o.msgid: They'll be even more valuable if their outpost has time to grow.  Might be worth it to cut them some slack, say about 15 instead?

If you have the cash, sure. I've accept.msgid: If you have the cash, sure.  I've accepted that group's offers mostly since they've been reliable customers.  I've been honoring their deals pretty close to what they figure it at, so 200 Merch should cover it.

On second thought, I'll pay in scales..msgid: On second thought, I'll pay in scales.  Here you go.

I don't have enough cash, so I'll pay in.msgid: I don't have enough cash, so I'll pay in gold.

Pleasure doing business with you. I'll.msgid: Pleasure doing business with you.  I'll have my men set up the next caravan with the usual instructions and put together their inventory based on Sofia's recommendations.  Let me print up the receipt.

Thank you. I'll bring this back to her..msgid: Thank you.  I'll bring this back to her.

You've got a point, if she couldn't make.msgid: You've got a point, if she couldn't make the trip herself then they could use the help.  Just this once, that's the best I can do.  That's 50 Merch worth of difference there, lot of literal blood, sweat, and tears to get enough supplies to spare for trade.

Sorry, 20 golden scales is as low as I c.msgid: Sorry, 20 golden scales is as low as I can go.  Gold's not as handy now that the world's ended.  I'm already taking their offer just about at face value.

Nevermind, I'll be back later on..msgid: Nevermind, I'll be back later on.

Alright. Try not to lose this one..msgid: Alright.  Try not to lose this one.

Thank you, I'll go bring this to her..msgid: Thank you, I'll go bring this to her.

Thank you. I'll see what I can do..msgid: Thank you.  I'll see what I can do.

If you have the cash, sure. I've accept.msgid: If you have the cash, sure.  I've accepted that group's offers mostly since they've been reliable customers.  I've been honoring their deals pretty close to what they figure it at, so 175 Merch should cover it.

Sorry, 20 golden scales is as low as I c.msgid: Sorry, 20 golden scales is as low as I can.  Gold's not as handy now that the world's ended. I'm already taking their offer just about at face value.

It's a small community building up a rur.msgid: It's a small community building up a rural church, that's starting to become self-sufficient.

I'll figure something else out. Thank y.msgid: I'll figure something else out.  Thank you, though.

I see. If they're looking for laborers,.msgid: I see.  If they're looking for laborers, I think I can make an arrangement.  Main thing we need is another source of food.  If their group is growing or hunting, I could wrangle a few spare laborers along with contacting one of the local hunters that deals with the center.  That should help them stay in surplus without too much risk to our ventures.

I'm not sure yet, let's talk about somet.msgid: I'm not sure yet, let's talk about something else.

I'll have my contact set up a party to g.msgid: I'll have my contact set up a party to get things set up.  Pleasure doing business with you, hoping this pans out.

Thank you, let's talk about something el.msgid: Thank you, let's talk about something else.

Thank you. That's all for now, goodbye..msgid: Thank you.  That's all for now, goodbye.

Sorry, don't have time to chat..msgid: Sorry, don't have time to chat.

It doesn't feel like it's working. What.msgid: It doesn't feel like it's working.  What am I doing wrong?

It is an honor to see you again, Chosen..msgid: It is an honor to see you again, Chosen.  How may I help you?

Welcome back. How may I help you?.msgid: Welcome back.  How may I help you?

[MISSION] I was tasked with clearing out.msgid: [MISSION] I was tasked with clearing out an anomaly that recently appeared.  Do you have any advice?

[MISSION] I've been sent to ask about re.msgid: [MISSION] I've been sent to ask about recent attacks on survivors by anomalous creatures.  Know anything about that?

I would like for you to go ahead and att.msgid: I would like for you to go ahead and attempt to send allies to the rural church.

[MISSION] I was sent here on behalf of t.msgid: [MISSION] I was sent here on behalf of the Cleansing Flame.  I was informed that you know of the Keepers?

Strange dreams and visions led me here..msgid: Strange dreams and visions led me here.

I have seen His blessings, and know what.msgid: I have seen His blessings, and know what you have sought.

Is there anything I can do to help?.msgid: Is there anything I can do to help?

What I can do to help?.msgid: What I can do to help?

So, what can I do to help?.msgid: So, what can I do to help?

You mentioned more to talk about, along.msgid: You mentioned more to talk about, along with this mission?

[MISSION] Can you offer advice regarding.msgid: [MISSION] Can you offer advice regarding how to charge the sword?

[MISSION] How will you know what \"signs.msgid: [MISSION] How will you know what "signs" reveal the favor of He From Beyond The Veil?

What is there to discuss, before we go f.msgid: What is there to discuss, before we go further?

[MISSION] Can you offer me any help with.msgid: [MISSION] Can you offer me any help with restoring the sword?

You mentioned you had answers to go with.msgid: You mentioned you had answers to go with this task?

So, what I can help with?.msgid: So, what I can help with?

These are dark times, and may yet grow d.msgid: These are dark times, and may yet grow darker still.  I am certain you face the same interloper that drove my order into its final ruin.  But they are only one of many who do not belong here.  What can even be done, if a hundred more unknowable, immortal intruders take its place, and a thousand have already slipped through?  Simple.  We drive them back, any way we can.  Time will tell if this bears fruit.  Whatever truly comes of this, I do not expect that I will live to see it.  The outcome may well be beyond your time as well.

Don't give up? That's all the advice yo.msgid: Don't give up?  That's all the advice you have?

You are a member of the Cleaning Flame,.msgid: You are a member of the Cleaning Flame, are you not?  I can tell by that fire in your eyes.  Perhaps it is foolish of me to lecture one of you on the virtue of determination.  As your tenets say, so long as the Sun shines upon the Earth.  I'm afraid I know too little of this interloper to guide you.  I would say only to be cautious, but that too is what your order demands, is it not?

I do not know what form this interloper.msgid: I do not know what form this interloper may take, what dreadful power and madness you may face.  Be prepared for anything, but that advice is of little use to you.  That you do not lose hope is what's more useful to you.  Without that, you will not find the answers you seek.

Thank you. I'll report back to them, th.msgid: Thank you.  I'll report back to them, then.

Very well. I will do what I can, with t.msgid: Very well.  I will do what I can, with the few passers-by who travel through the area.  I am hopeful that will be of use to you.

So you, Chosen, have allied with the hun.msgid: So you, Chosen, have allied with the hunters.  The oath may be immortal, but I am hardly fit to be called a servant of He From Beyond The Veil, not anymore.  What can you tell me of their intentions?

I was not expecting they would find me s.msgid: I was not expecting they would find me so easily.  My days as a Keeper are long gone, I have nothing left in my name but old books and what nature offers us all.  For what purpose do they hunt an old man?

You bear the indelible mark of the Sangu.msgid: You bear the indelible mark of the Sanguine Order's transhuman dabbling, and yet it was the Cleaning Flame that sent you on this quest?  Whether you were one of the blood mages or merely stumbled into their work, this is unusual.  What do they seek from me?

They seek to learn from the ways of the.msgid: They seek to learn from the ways of the Chosen who have come before me.

We are both bound by immortal oath. I c.msgid: We are both bound by immortal oath.  I chose to come to their aid.

We are not here as hunters, but to make.msgid: We are not here as hunters, but to make amends and secure knowledge.

I was one of their enemies. What does t.msgid: I was one of their enemies.  What does that tell you?

They're interested in seeking out allies.msgid: They're interested in seeking out allies and intel.

They're interested in any research into.msgid: They're interested in any research into the Beyond you may be willing to offer them.

They are not the ones hunting you. Hand.msgid: They are not the ones hunting you.  Hand over the research, or else.

Can you tell me if any other Keepers sti.msgid: Can you tell me if any other Keepers still live?  They seek knowledge and allies.

Do you have any research of your own the.msgid: Do you have any research of your own they may benefit from, concerning the Beyond?

So we are not as alone as I once believe.msgid: So we are not as alone as I once believed.  If you believe that it is wise to ally with the hunters, then I will trust your judgment, young one.  Tell me, what is it they seek?

They seek to mend old wounds and ally wi.msgid: They seek to mend old wounds and ally with us, in addition to preserving any knowledge beyond our written Oaths.

They have asked for further insight into.msgid: They have asked for further insight into the Beyond and its dangers, and any way to combat it that you have learned.

So you are one of them as well? Then te.msgid: So you are one of them as well?  Then tell me, for what purpose do they send you?

We are here to gather allies, to defend.msgid: We are here to gather allies, to defend what remains of humanity and make up for past mistakes.

We seek knowledge, further learning of t.msgid: We seek knowledge, further learning of the Beyond that you may have accumulated during your studies.

Our motives are our own. Hand over any.msgid: Our motives are our own.  Hand over any research you are hoarding, now.

An unusual alliance, if so. Tell me, wh.msgid: An unusual alliance, if so.  Tell me, what have they sent you for?

More allies it seems, not to mention mor.msgid: More allies it seems, not to mention more intel to get their hands on.

They're after research of some sort, foc.msgid: They're after research of some sort, focused on the Beyond.  Something they wanted you for specifically.

[ATTACK] I don't really give a shit. I'.msgid: [ATTACK] I don't really give a shit.  I'll take what they want, and you can try to stop me.

To tell the truth, I don't know. We los.msgid: To tell the truth, I don't know.  We lost so many, and I can only recall with certainty that all of the high priests succumbed to various perils prior to all this.  One of them had been my mentor, and they would've been our best hope for regaining contact with any others.

Is there any other way you could help ma.msgid: Is there any other way you could help make alliances with them?

And what of the research concerning the.msgid: And what of the research concerning the Beyond?  They're looking for something more than what's in Oaths to The Chalice.

I can make an attempt at least. On occa.msgid: I can make an attempt at least.  On occasion I do hear from others who travel the area, some hints and fragments.  I doubt that, even if I were more open about what I seek, I would be able to reach out to any other members of our order.  I can try however, if you'd like.

I would appreciate that. Thank you..msgid: I would appreciate that.  Thank you.

That won't be needed for now, our main c.msgid: That won't be needed for now, our main concern is the information.

Thank you. I have other questions, befo.msgid: Thank you.  I have other questions, before I go.

Thank you. I should go bring this to th.msgid: Thank you.  I should go bring this to them.

I have been working on some efforts to f.msgid: I have been working on some efforts to further guard our world against the threats that we are faced with, but I fear it is incomplete.  Regardless, I would be willing to trust it to you, if you are certain they will make good use of it.  Moreover, I know that they seek allies.  My time as a Keeper has long passed, but I could do what I can to guide those who come here, that they may find the right place.

That sounds fine, sure. So, about your.msgid: That sounds fine, sure.  So, about your research…

Don't worry about it for now, preserving.msgid: Don't worry about it for now, preserving this research is more important.

I have other questions, before I go..msgid: I have other questions, before I go.

I should go bring this to them..msgid: I should go bring this to them.

How very peculiar. Rarely does a dream.msgid: How very peculiar.  Rarely does a dream offer any meaningful omen.  I can offer you little advice, other than to be cautious when following strange visions.  A lesson some who study the things haunting this world learn the hard way.

Lastly, I require a copy of Sanguine Cod.msgid: Lastly, I require a copy of Sanguine Codex.  As I said before, without it we can't reference the rites the blood mages used to subvert this weapon.  You will not need to know and recite their wretched rituals to break the seal, only have the patterns they transcribed on hand.

Now then, with the circle prepared and t.msgid: Now then, with the circle prepared and the foundation laid for the ritual, we will need essence to fuel it.  It must, specifically, be blood essence.  The sanguinists designed their corruptive ritual to rely on that drawn from the life of others, and only power of similar nature can break this curse.  Twelve motes of blood shall fuel the ritual.

Very well then. Some of what we require.msgid: Very well then.  Some of what we require are already available to me.  His holy word, an adequate sacred symbol, and the means to spark a fire.  I want you to remember, and understand, the importance of each part of the ritual.  Fire to anoint the blade, a focus to draw out the evil.  And the wisdom of He From Beyond The Veil, the words of power that elude your grasp. We will go in order, step by step.  The first thing I need of you is salt, enough to create a circle of it.  This binds the blade and safeguards us against any backlash from the ritual.

I have the artifact. I'm ready..msgid: I have the artifact.  I'm ready.

Here's the book you asked for. What's n.msgid: Here's the book you asked for.  What's next?

I don't have the book you need. I'll be.msgid: I don't have the book you need.  I'll be back later.

Here's the twelve blood essence you aske.msgid: Here's the twelve blood essence you asked for.

I don't have what is needed. I'll be ba.msgid: I don't have what is needed.  I'll be back later.

I have the salt, hopefully this should b.msgid: I have the salt, hopefully this should be enough…

I don't have enough salt to make a circl.msgid: I don't have enough salt to make a circle.  I'll be back later.

Good. Watch, and know the importance of.msgid: Good.  Watch, and know the importance of what transpires.  The blade, placed within the circle.  "Let every wound in The Veil be a necessary one, or else leave no mark."  To guard and guide, I bear His mark…

The sanguine sign I have read, and sacre.msgid: The sanguine sign I have read, and sacred words I call to mind.  But they are not to be spoken, not until all has fallen into place.  "Through our sacrifices, we burn away what is undesirable in ourselves, and cultivate what is good."  The fire is lit, the blade anointed by flame.

The essence, I channel into the edge of.msgid: The essence, I channel into the edge of my knife, and cut away the corrupted runes like a cancer to be excised.  "A wound that is opened cannot truly be reversed, only mended."  Now…

It is best to work through this for your.msgid: It is best to work through this for yourself, and thus I cannot do it for you.  But I can offer advice and some degree of assistance.  The main things you will need are His sacred word, Oaths to The Chalice.  You'll also need to consult Sanguine Codex to decipher the original spell.

There's just one problem with consulting.msgid: There's just one problem with consulting these books…

Do you have a copy of Oaths to The Chali.msgid: Do you have a copy of Oaths to The Chalice?

Do you have a copy of Sanguine Codex?.msgid: Do you have a copy of Sanguine Codex?

What else will I need to do to restore t.msgid: What else will I need to do to restore the sword?

Go on, young one. What is it? Is somet.msgid: Go on, young one.  What is it?  Is something wrong?

It's nothing. I'll figure it out..msgid: It's nothing.  I'll figure it out.

Read it well, and use it well. This is.msgid: Read it well, and use it well.  This is the holy word of He From Beyond The Veil, He above all earthly gods.

You will require fire to burn the corrup.msgid: You will require fire to burn the corruption from the blade, a holy symbol to restore its sanctity.  Even those of this world's faiths will suffice, even the sacred tools of the Cleansing Flame if nothing else, or the chalice we use for our rituals.  Salt for the ritual circle, and blood essence to fuel the counter-spell contained within the Sanguine Codex.  It would be best if you seek these items on your own, to better understand the gravity of your task.

There are two methods. The first is to.msgid: There are two methods.  The first is to draw upon the energy given off by a portal.  You need to be close to one, as close as you can without stepping into it.  Other than that, crystallized essence can be used as a substitute.

So that's why you mentioned an anomaly..msgid: So that's why you mentioned an anomaly.

Indeed. It's recent enough that, with t.msgid: Indeed.  It's recent enough that, with the right means, one can sense such disturbances while they are fresh.  Be prepared for whatever monsters may have followed from these wounds in The Veil.

As our book says. Any otherworldly mons.msgid: As our book says.  Any otherworldly monster must be returned to its true domain, living or dead…

If that is what you seek, the way forwar.msgid: If that is what you seek, the way forward lies within Oaths to The Chalice.  It is used to fuel powerful magic, though many of the rituals needing such concentrated power have long since been lost.

Though certain arcane blessings have fou.msgid: Though certain arcane blessings have found their way into this world by other means, the ones He grants are different.  Their divine origin can be sensed, and they flow through body and soul with greater ease.  My eyes may be failing me, but some senses never dull.

You have recovered an item of great and.msgid: You have recovered an item of great and terrible power.  This was once a relic handed down from He From Beyond The Veil, one of seven in fact.  Only this one remains.

Do you know what happened to the other s.msgid: Do you know what happened to the other six?

What if I would prefer to destroy this r.msgid: What if I would prefer to destroy this relic?

Indeed there were. Seven sacrifices, se.msgid: Indeed there were.  Seven sacrifices, seven gifts from He From Beyond The Veil… left in the care of seven high priests.  They were to use these to serve His will, to prevent the wounds in The Veil from worsening.  We failed in that.

What happened to the other six.msgid: What happened to the other six

A few were known to have been destroyed,.msgid: A few were known to have been destroyed, others lost as this one was, though I doubt we will ever recover them.

I'm sorry. Is there any way to atone fo.msgid: I'm sorry.  Is there any way to atone for this?

This was not my doing. They were fools.msgid: This was not my doing.  They were fools to unleash something they couldn't control.

I may have followed the same path as the.msgid: I may have followed the same path as them, but I was not one of them.

Treachery like that is why the Cleansing.msgid: Treachery like that is why the Cleansing Flame was founded, united in opposition to what those vermin did to people.

That's all I need to know for now..msgid: That's all I need to know for now.

Thank you. You have a duty, that you ha.msgid: Thank you.  You have a duty, that you have accepted by retrieving this relic.  Together we shall correct the mistakes of both our orders.

Hmmph. You have your own responsibiliti.msgid: Hmmph.  You have your own responsibilities.  You must be better than they were.

Then the path ahead of you shall be diff.msgid: Then the path ahead of you shall be difficult, but there is still hope.  You will not be able to make full use of the blade once it is restored, but you can still help.

This is true. But do not let yourself b.msgid: This is true.  But do not let yourself be blinded by hatred.  I had known many of them, and a few sought power for less destructive reasons.  If any of them are left, they must be guided into righting the wrongs their fellows have committed.

What? Please, you can't! I know that t.msgid: What?  Please, you can't!  I know that this corruption is dangerous, and it will take great effort to fix it, but it can do so much good if it is restored… I can't allow that.

Fine. Tell me what I need to do to fix.msgid: Fine.  Tell me what I need to do to fix it.

[ATTACK] My duty demands it, this is far.msgid: [ATTACK] My duty demands it, this is far too dangerous to risk.  Try and stop me, old man.

Seeing it now, you have done a lot to re.msgid: Seeing it now, you have done a lot to restore the relic.  But I fear the damage may be permanent.  Regardless, it can still serve its purpose.

Tell me what I must do..msgid: Tell me what I must do.

In its original state, it could manipula.msgid: In its original state, it could manipulate and control the instabilities that now linger in this realm, not just seal them.  There were many rituals this could be used for, but even if this was an option, they require years of training to practice safely.  We shall have to make do with what remains of the purpose it can serve.

And what is the sword's purpose?.msgid: And what is the sword's purpose?

That's all I need for now, then..msgid: That's all I need for now, then.

To mend the wounds in The Veil. Well, t.msgid: To mend the wounds in The Veil.  Well, to treat them at least, and ideally prevent them.  After all, as it is said, it is our duty not to revert what has been done, but to ensure we will endure.

We had hoped to mend the wounds in The V.msgid: We had hoped to mend the wounds in The Veil as well as prevent any further instability.  Despite our differences, we have a common goal.

Very well. That's enough questions for.msgid: Very well.  That's enough questions for now.

Very well then. Tell me what I am to do.msgid: Very well then.  Tell me what I am to do.

Our duties have some overlap and offer u.msgid: Our duties have some overlap and offer us the means to work together, but they are not the same in all respects.
